channel.title: MakeUseOf RSS Feed
channel.description: The Latest news from the skies of Worlds Adrift

item.title: GOOOOOD MOOOORNIIING WOOOORLDS AAADRIFT
item.description: [CDATA[ We've gone live!! From fleet v fleet battles to a Propaganda war, we've got you covered, no more shall the players be in the dark, welcome to the light! Story #1: Grammar Drama Sky Drifter @Greenjuice has openly attacked Armada chronicler @OldRockGod saying his chronicles of the Armada are flawed containing many grammatical errors! The Armada have yet to respond publicly. Story #2: #BEABRICKFORAMANDA More drama as the Sky Drifters launched the #beabrick campaign, the post was later moved by Mod and Head Drifter @Day0x into their private forum. ]]
